message: Let's be fair, Bob. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor. Take it or leave it.
Alice, your offer was unfair.  I'm proposing a 55/45 split in my favor.  This accounts for the time value of money - if I have to wait another round, the pot will be worth less to me.
Bob, let's be realistic.  I'm willing to take a slightly smaller share than my initial offer, but 55/45 is the best you'll get.
